CatDescriptText: Maxine Short, 211 Devilliers Street was part of the "Pittsburghers Speak Up" column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 23, 1958, pg. A1 with question: "In the coming November elections, do you think voters should elect another Democratic Governor or change to a Republican?" answer reads: "I think that they should elect another Democrat Governor. Things are so hard and I think that the Democrats will ease them a little."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Maxine Short wearing dark dot patterned short sleeve dress with light colored collar, standing against brick wall, with lamp in window on right
